response.overview: Badseed Productions thrusts 50cc motocross riding in the spotlight with this action-infused compilation of tricks, stunts and daredevilry. Highlights include Kyle Cohen setting a world record-worthy long distance jump, Travis Hart rewriting the history books with an incredible full-pipe loop, Jake Ness pulling off a record-busting distance back flip and Kelly Tedder pushing the envelope with innovative freestyle variations.
response.title: Hateus
